video.title: The Munsters
video.synopsis: Herman and Lily Munster are just your typical ghouls-next-door ... with a vampire grandpa, a werewolf son and a normal-looking niece.

episodes.synopsis: With Eddie at home with a babysitter, the rest of the Munsters head off to a costume party being thrown by the parents of Marilyn's boyfriend.
episodes.title: Munster Masquerade

episodes.synopsis: Marilyn is having guy trouble, so Grandpa secretly concocts a love potion to make her attractive to the opposite sex. But Grandpa's plan backfires.
episodes.title: My Fair Munster

episodes.synopsis: Stressed out and suffering from insomnia, Herman starts taking late-night walks in the park. But reports soon spread of a monster prowling the park.
episodes.title: A Walk on the Mild Side

episodes.synopsis: After listening in on a conversation between Lily and Marilyn, Herman and Grandpa become convinced that Lily is pregnant.
episodes.title: Rock-a-Bye Munster

episodes.synopsis: The Munsters object to the gas company running a pipeline underneath their house because it would destroy Grandpa's dungeon lab.
episodes.title: Pike's Pique

episodes.synopsis: Herman learns his army buddies are having a reunion. When he finds out he no longer fits into his old uniform, he makes losing weight a top priority.
episodes.title: Low-Cal Munster

episodes.synopsis: Eddie¿s under pressure to do well on his science fair project. When Eddie presents the robot he built with Grandpa, the judges make a big mistake.
episodes.title: Tin Can Man

episodes.synopsis: A professional wresting manager learns Herman has superhuman strength and recruits him to fight as the Masked Marvel. But Herman¿s too nice to win.
episodes.title: Herman the Great

episodes.synopsis: Lily recently inherited some money, so Herman¿s suspicious when his swindling twin brother, Charlie, comes looking for backers for his new invention.
episodes.title: Knock Wood, Here Comes Charlie

episodes.synopsis: Looking for love and companionship, Grandpa signs up with a matchmaking agency. An elderly woman takes a shine to him, but all she wants is his money.
episodes.title: Autumn Croakus

episodes.synopsis: Herman falls asleep in his car and bank robbers steal the car with him still in it. He awakens in their hideout and is mistaken for someone else.
episodes.title: The Midnight Ride of Herman Munster

episodes.synopsis: Having trouble falling asleep, Marilyn accidentally takes one of Grandpa's potions, which prevents her from waking up until a prince has kissed her.
episodes.title: The Sleeping Cutie

episodes.synopsis: A magazine chooses the Munsters as its "Average American Family." But when Grandpa vanishes, they might miss out on the photo shoot and cash prize.
episodes.title: Family Portrait

episodes.synopsis: Feeling neglected, a sulking Grandpa heads off on his own without saying good-bye. The family soon discovers he's performing at a nearby nightclub.
episodes.title: Grandpa Leaves Home

episodes.synopsis: The family's savings are missing and Lily believes Herman¿s at fault. When she secretly tries to earn extra cash, Herman thinks she's cheating on him.
episodes.title: Herman's Rival

episodes.synopsis: While on a family camping trip, Grandpa hears the howling of wolves, which reminds him of his younger days, so he sneaks off to have fun.
episodes.title: Grandpa's Call of the Wild

episodes.synopsis: Herman goes to Marilyn¿s college to handle a tuition bill issue but gets sidetracked when the school's basketball coach offers him a spot on the team.
episodes.title: All-Star Munster

episodes.synopsis: While playing around with Grandpa's ham radio, Herman receives a message and becomes convinced that aliens are about to land on Earth.
episodes.title: If a Martian Answers, Hang Up

episodes.synopsis: Eddie¿s upset that kids at school are picking on him because he's short. Grandpa makes a potion to help Eddie grow taller, but it has side effects.
episodes.title: Eddie's Nickname

episodes.synopsis: Eddie wants to bring Spot to the school pet fair. But Spot is too shy to leave the house, so Eddie brings a bat, which is really Grandpa in disguise.
episodes.title: Bats of a Feather

episodes.synopsis: An intimidated bank teller thinks Herman and Grandpa are robbers and gives them wads of cash. Herman tries to return the money when the bank¿s closed.
episodes.title: Don't Bank on Herman

episodes.synopsis: Herman¿s a terrible dancer but he wants to take Marilyn to her school dance. He's tricked into signing up for hundreds of lessons at a dancing school.
episodes.title: Dance with Me, Herman

episodes.synopsis: Herman is secretly training to become a detective and leaves each night to practice his sleuthing skills. Lily begins to suspect he¿s cheating on her.
episodes.title: Follow That Munster

episodes.synopsis: Angry that Herman came home late from an office party, Lily forces him to sleep on the couch. Their discord leads them to seek professional help.
episodes.title: Love Locked Out

episodes.synopsis: Eddie's annoying new friend, Googie, visits the Munster house and starts wreaking havoc. Grandpa believes he's accidentally turned him into a monkey.
episodes.title: Come Back Little Googie

episodes.synopsis: Agreeing to rent out their house to the Standells, who are in town for a concert, the Munsters return early to find beatniks and hipsters everywhere.
episodes.title: Far Out Munsters

episodes.synopsis: Eddie, who is currently playing on a baseball team, becomes upset when he finds out that his family has decided to move to Buffalo.
episodes.title: Munsters on the Move

episodes.synopsis: Two men claiming to be movie producers offer Herman a role in their upcoming film. But they¿re really out to kill Herman and get the insurance money.
episodes.title: Movie Star Munster

episodes.synopsis: Herman catches the attention of Dodgers manager Leo Durocher after hitting him on the head with a baseball that was struck from several blocks away.
episodes.title: Herman the Rookie

episodes.synopsis: Through a TV promotion, Herman wins a membership to an elite country club, but the club's membership board still to approve his family's acceptance.
episodes.title: Country Club Munsters

episodes.synopsis: The Munsters receive gold doubloons from an uncle and deposit them at the bank. Seeing this fortune, a bank employee tries to get close to Marilyn.
episodes.title: Love Comes to Mockingbird Heights

episodes.synopsis: After taking sleeping pills, Herman accidentally gets trapped in an Egyptian sarcophagus at the natural history museum and gets mistaken for a mummy.
episodes.title: Mummy Munster

episodes.synopsis: Lily is hired as a fashion model based on her unique look. Jealous that his wife will be working with attractive men, Herman decides to spy on her.
episodes.title: Lily Munster, Girl Model

episodes.synopsis: When Eddie signs him up to perform in a school talent show, the unskilled and uncoordinated Herman turns to Grandpa and his special shoes for help.
episodes.title: Munster the Magnificent

episodes.synopsis: The Munsters go to see a piece of land they purchased from a pair of con artists. The crooks are shocked when the Munsters love the old ghost town.
episodes.title: Herman's Happy Valley

episodes.synopsis: Thanks to Eddie's big mouth, Herman is forced to compete in a drag race against a professional driver and the family's car is on the line.
episodes.title: Hot Rod Herman

episodes.synopsis: Herman gets fired but doesn¿t tell Lily. Pretending he still has his old job, he tries out several new occupations but without much success.
episodes.title: Herman's Raise

episodes.synopsis: Herman sees young Gale trapped between two metal bars, so he bends the bars back to set the boy free but Gale¿s family doesn¿t believe the boy¿s tale.
episodes.title: Yes, Galen, There Is a Herman

episodes.synopsis: Eddie's friend Charlie Pike convinces him to run away from home. Herman encourages the boy, using child psychology as seen on "Leave it to Beaver."
episodes.title: Herman's Child Psychology

episodes.synopsis: While at the beach, Herman¿s accidentally scooped up by a Russian fishing boat. They think he might be an evolutionary relic or a clever American spy.
episodes.title: Herman, the Master Spy

episodes.synopsis: After Eddie enters him in a rodeo contest, an uneasy Herman seeks Grandpa¿s help before he rides Volcano, a bucking bronco with a bad reputation.
episodes.title: Bronco Bustin' Munster

episodes.synopsis: When Herman takes up photography and inadvertently snaps a picture of bank robbers fleeing the scene of a crime, the crooks track Herman down.
episodes.title: Herman Munster, Shutter Bug

episodes.synopsis: When Herman's training methods fail to make Eddie a track star in time for an important meet, Grandpa secretly cooks up his own solution.
episodes.title: Herman, Coach of the Year

episodes.synopsis: To buy each other a special 100th wedding anniversary gift, both Herman and Lily secretly get jobs as welders and wind up working next to each other.
episodes.title: Happy 100th Anniversary

episodes.synopsis: Herman is suspicious of Chester, the Munsters' mysterious new boarder, when he finds a gun in his room. Is he endangering the Munster household?
episodes.title: Lily's Star Boarder

episodes.synopsis: When Herman suffers amnesia after a 300-pound safe falls on his head, Lily and Grandpa hatch a scheme to shock Herman into remembering.
episodes.title: John Doe Munster

episodes.synopsis: A handsome man rescues Marilyn when she¿s accidentally locked in her room. The family mistakes him for a frog Grandpa previously turned into a prince.
episodes.title: A Man for Marilyn

episodes.synopsis: Herman faces some unique challenges when he tries to renew his driver's license so he can drive the funeral parlor's hearse and nab a promotion.
episodes.title: Herman's Driving Test

episodes.synopsis: Herman sings into a tape recorder as a goof. When the recording ends up on the radio, it's a big hit, but will Herman's growing ego ruin everything?
episodes.title: Will Success Spoil Herman Munster?

episodes.synopsis: When Spot runs away, Herman tracks him down in the sewers, where they¿re both spotted and branded as terrible monsters that must be eliminated.
episodes.title: Underground Munster

episodes.synopsis: Following an old treasure map, Herman and Grandpa cooperate to dig up a fortune in the dungeon. But then they argue over who should get to keep it.
episodes.title: The Treasure of Mockingbird Heights

episodes.synopsis: Herman and Eddie are both being bullied. Herman advises his son to ignore the harassment, but when they both get black eyes, it's time for payback.
episodes.title: Herman's Peace Offensive

episodes.synopsis: When Eddie¿s caught gambling, Herman intends to teach him a lesson by betting all of Eddie¿s winnings on a losing horse. But Grandpa has another idea.
episodes.title: Herman Picks a Winner

episodes.synopsis: Fooling around with Grandpa's lab equipment, Herman suffers a horribly disfiguring accident that leaves him looking like a regular man.
episodes.title: Just Another Pretty Face

episodes.synopsis: During a family trip, Herman gets stranded in the desert and wanders into a Native American village, where he's mistaken for an ancient sacred spirit.
episodes.title: Big Heap Herman

episodes.synopsis: It's a battle of the sexes when the Munsters split a $10,000 windfall: Lily and Marilyn open a salon, and Herman and Grandpa work on an invention.
episodes.title: The Most Beautiful Ghoul in the World

episodes.synopsis: Grandpa falls under suspicion when a woman from Iowa claims he's her long-lost husband. Grandpa denies it until he learns that she's rich.
episodes.title: Grandpa's Lost Wife

episodes.synopsis: Eddie's birthday gift to Marilyn is a ring bearing the dreaded Fregosi Emerald. They must find a Fregosi descendant to remove the ring¿s evil aura.
episodes.title: The Fregosi Emerald

episodes.synopsis: Herman is jealous when Eddie begins to idolize Zombo, the popular host of a televised horror show. Herman sets out to win back Eddie¿s admiration.
episodes.title: Zombo

episodes.synopsis: With a nod to Cyrano de Bergerac, Herman helps a co-worker, Clyde, court a girl by writing love poems that Clyde passes off as his own.
episodes.title: Cyrano de Munster

episodes.synopsis: Grandpa makes a potion that instantly improves Eddie's trumpet-playing skills. But a second batch of the brew turns Eddie into a rebellious punk.
episodes.title: The Musician

episodes.synopsis: When Marilyn's art professor sees her statue of Herman, he invites Herman to a meeting with other professors to see if he's an evolutionary throwback.
episodes.title: Prehistoric Munster

episodes.synopsis: Lily mistakes the bumbling Johann, one of Dr. Frankenstein IV's earlier "models," for Herman and whisks him away for a romantic weekend.
episodes.title: A Visit From Johann

episodes.synopsis: When Eddie asks his parents for a younger brother, Grandpa constructs a robot boy named Boris. But Eddie soon resents the attention Boris receives.
episodes.title: Eddie's Brother

episodes.synopsis: Herman tells Marilyn he'll get a good deal on a car for her but ends up getting cheated by a slick used car salesman who dubs himself "Fair Deal Dan."
episodes.title: Herman, the Tire-Kicker

episodes.synopsis: When Herman accidentally ruins Grandpa's birthday gift for Eddie, they argue and paint a line down the middle of the house to mark their territories.
episodes.title: A House Divided

episodes.synopsis: After being put in a trance by Grandpa to cure his hiccups, Herman is kidnapped by two daring college coeds who sneak him into a sorority house.
episodes.title: Herman's Sorority Caper

episodes.synopsis: When Herman is struck by a car, the nervous driver offers him a large cash settlement. But Herman misunderstands and thinks he owes the driver money.
episodes.title: Herman's Lawsuit

episodes.synopsis: Eddie's curious teachers decide to pay the Munsters a visit at home when they read Eddie's imaginative essay about life at the Munster household.
episodes.title: A Visit from the Teacher
